mapper.sql: id, task_log_id, task_id, rule_table_id, sqlldr_info_id, subtask_id, file_path, file_name, file_size, file_record_rows, start_time, end_time, circle_time, update_time, delete_time
mapper.select: select r.target_table_name tableName, i.sqlldr_info_name sqlldrInfoName, file_path filePath, l.file_name fileName, file_record_rows fileRecordRows, circle_time circleTime, t.task_status taskStatus, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, delete_time deleteTime, error_msg errorMsg, ctl_context ctlContext, tns_url tnsUrl from t_import_task_log l inner join t_import_rule_table r on l.rule_table_id = r.rule_table_id inner join t_import_sqlldr_info i on l.sqlldr_info_id = i.sqlldr_info_id inner join t_import_task t on t.task_id = l.task_id inner join t_import_subtask s on l.subtask_id = s.subtask_id where l.id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_import_task_log
or id like #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_import_task_log (id, task_log_id, task_id, rule_table_id, sqlldr_info_id, subtask_id, file_path, file_name, file_size, file_record_rows, start_time, end_time, circle_time, update_time, delete_time, error_msg) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleTableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileRecordRows,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{circleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{errorMsg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
